full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAG BSAM SHING GI SGRUB PA YI DVAGS SKYE SGO GCOD THABS BDE BA CAN GYI ZHING DU 'GRO BA'I LAM RGYAGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,('DI NI RGYUN KHYER THUN RE NYAMS BLANGS NA, ,SER SNA'I SGRIB PA MA LUS BYANG 'GYUR ZHING, ,YI DVAGS SKYE BA'I SKYE SGO CHOD GYUR NAS, ,RNAM YANG DBUL PO SKYE BAR MI 'GYUR ZHING, ,BSOD NAMS RJE 'PHEL TSE 'DIR LONGS SPYOD DANG, ,PHYI MA BDE BA CAN GYI ZHING KHAMS SKYE, ,'BRAS BU RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS THOB PAR 'GYUR, ,NOR SGRUB KUN GYI MCHOG GYUR 'DI YIN NO, ,TSE 'DIR LHA MI'I 'GRO BA THAMS CAD BYAMS, ,RGYAL PO CHAD PA LA SOGS 'JIGS KUN SKYOBS, ,MI KUN DAD CING @004B GUS PAS DBANG DU 'DU, ,DPAG BSAM SHING GI SGRUB PA ZHES BYA BA, ,KU RU KULLE'I RGYUD DANG RTOGS PA NAS, ,GSUNGS PA'I GDAMS NGAG SHIN TU ZAB PA STE, , 'DI NYID SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYIS DNGOS SU GSUNGS, ,DE PHYIR KHUNGS BTZUN THE TSOM BRAL BA YIN, , DGE SLONG SANGS RGYAS DAR GYIS BSKUL BA'I PHYIR, ,R'A GA AA SYAS SNGA DRO'I THUN 'TSAMS LA, ,GZHAN PHAN BSAM PAS RDZOGS PAR SMRAS PA STE, , BLA MA PADMA THABS MKHAS ZHES BYAS BRIS, ,DGE BAS 'GRO KUN YI DVAGS @005A *, ,SKYE SGO CHOD, ,'DZAD MED RIN CHEN GTER LA SPYOD PAR SHOG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
